About One N Done Bond Clean

Queensland's trusted professional cleaning service with a 100% bond back guarantee. Proudly serving 345+ suburbs across Brisbane, Logan, and Ipswich.

Our Story

Founded with a simple mission: to help Queensland renters get their full bond back without the stress and hassle of end-of-lease cleaning. We understand that moving is already stressful enough.

What started as a small family business has grown to become one of Queensland's most trusted cleaning services, serving over 345 suburbs across Brisbane, Logan, and Ipswich.

Every member of our team is trained to meet strict real estate standards, ensuring your property passes inspection the first time. That's why we can offer our 100% bond back guarantee.

Our Values

Quality Guaranteed

We never compromise on quality. Every job is completed to real estate standards with our 100% bond back guarantee.

Customer First

Your satisfaction is our priority. We listen to your needs and tailor our services to exceed your expectations.

Reliable Service

We show up on time, every time. Professional, dependable service you can count on when you need it most.

Our Professional Team

Trained Professionals

All team members are thoroughly trained in real estate cleaning standards and use professional-grade equipment and eco-friendly products.

Fully Insured

Complete public liability and professional indemnity insurance coverage gives you peace of mind during every cleaning service.

Background Checked

All team members undergo thorough background checks and reference verification for your security and peace of mind.

Eco-Friendly Products

We use environmentally responsible cleaning products that are safe for your family, pets, and the planet.
